short_summary: Heavy equipment services and aggregate materials supply with curb and sidewalk repair
description: This is a request for a standing offer for heavy equipment services and supply of aggregate materials and for curb and sidewalk repair services. The services will be provided on an as required basis.
full_summary:
### Heavy Equipment Services, Supply of Aggregate Materials & Road, Curb and Sidewalk Repair

##### Solicitation Number

*   Solicitation Number: WS4378182302
*   Amendment Number: 2

##### Announcement Details

*   Publication Date: February 22, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: March 7, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   Amendment Date: February 23, 2024
*   Expected Contract Start Date: March 18, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: N/A

##### Mandatory Requirements

This solicitation supersedes the previous bid solicitation number DOC4402264543, dated January 19, 2024, with a closing date of February 15, 2024. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to offerors who have submitted their bids in response to the previous solicitation.

Mandatory requirements include providing skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and material as requested by the Department of National Defence in the form of call-ups for Heavy Equipment Services & Road, Sidewalk, and Curb Repairs.

Services are required on an "as required” basis, and it is anticipated that one (1) firm will be issued a 2-year standing offer with three (3) 1-year option periods.

Please note that the requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Notice Type and Evaluation

*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Evaluation Type: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Evaluation Method: Part 4 – Evaluation Procedures and Basis of Selection

### Mandatory Documents

It is mandatory to submit the following documents:

*   A completed solicitation form, signed and dated
*   A detailed service schedule
*   Valid business registration documents
*   Proof of liability insurance
*   Proof of workers' compensation insurance
*   Proof of professional liability insurance

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents can be downloaded from the [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18877477).

### Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). All tenders submitted by proponents who are not Canadian or who have production operations in Canada will be subject to additional review and verification.
